org.youscope.plugin.repeatjob

Interface RepeatJob

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Component, EditableJobContainer, Job, JobContainer, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface RepeatJob
extends Job, EditableJobContainer
    A job which consists of other jobs, which gets executed several times when the repeat job is executed. The single jobs will be run after each other in the order they are created. It is guaranteed that in between two jobs no other tasks are executed by the microscope.
    Author:
    Moritz Lang

    • Method Detail

      • getNumRepeats

        int getNumRepeats()
           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns the number of times the sub-jobs should be repeated each time the repeat-job is executed.
        Returns:
        number of times the job should be repeated.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • setNumRepeats

        void setNumRepeats(int numRepeats)
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                   MeasurementRunningException
        Sets the number of times the sub-jobs should be repeated each time the repeat-job is executed.
        Parameters:
        numRepeats - number of times the job should be repeated. If smaller than 0, it is set to zero.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        MeasurementRunningException
